name: Node-red-contrib-splitter
tagline: A Node-RED node to split arrays into seperate messages, making it easy to loop over
body: node-red-node-splitter ==================== This node iterates over an array. # The idea In enterprise integration patterns there are many names for this: a splitter, sequencer, iterator or chunkifier. In the end 'splitter' is the best name imho. More info [here](http://www.enterpriseintegrationpatterns.com/Sequencer.html) # Why a node? Well..look at this image, and then imagine using 10 loops in a similar way: Got the point? With visual progarmming the [Deutsch Limit](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Deutsch_limit) seems to lure around every corner. Better to make a node for that. # Installation Run: npm install node-red-contrib-splitter # Author Leon van Kammen, http://coderofsalvation.github.io / http://github.com/coderofsalvation # License GPL
